content.question: Which of the following best explains a conclusion about United States foreign policy in the early 1900s supported by the point of view expressed in the excerpt?

choices.label: Americans supported the goals of nationalists in the Philippines.
Americans expressed little opposition to acquiring new colonial possessions.
Political leaders usually did not consider the economic effects of overseas ventures.
Political leaders continued to promote the earlier idea of predestined national expansion.

content.answer: Political leaders continued to promote the earlier idea of predestined national expansion.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
